https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cz2Ssxtx4bNiXvNluJK0loyqND9.jpg Daisuke Yuge works as a tour guide in Oahu, Hawaii and also studies astronomy. He meets Rui Fujishima at a cafe and falls in love with her at first sight, but Rui Fujishima suffers from memory loss due to a past accident. 50 First Kisses
